thread.title: Win: holiday in Spain

author: The Telegraph
title: Win: holiday in Spain
text: The Telegraph, in association with Brittany Ferries, is giving readers the chance to experience an overnight cruise to northern Spain followed by a two-night stay in a luxurious Paradores hotel. The prize includes a return sailing from Portsmouth or Plymouth to Santander, with your own car, followed by two nights at a Parador hotel of your choice from Brittany Ferries’ collection. You’ll discover an unrivalled experience aboard one of Brittany Ferries’ cruise ferries. Enjoy a choice of restaurants, stylish bars and lounges, entertainment, cinemas, shops – and on some services, even a spa treatment room – all helping your break get off to the best and most relaxing start. A highlight of Brittany Ferries’ hotel collection, the Paradores of Spain is a group of hotels offering visitors high class standards of service and cuisine in unique surroundings. Many properties are former castles, monasteries or palaces resonating with character and history, which have been meticulously restored to their former elegance whilst subtly incorporating many modern creature comforts. Complete the form below by midnight on Sunday, August 30, 2015 and you could win this fantastic prize. Online Form - Win a luxurious Parador break in Spain
